catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 796
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: black lacquer table; scalloped cutouts on sides between base and rim; curved, scrolling, upturned feet
text: Low tables like this one would have been placed in front of the central image in a Buddhist temple. Implements such as an incense burner, bowls, candle stands, and offerings of flowers would be arrayed across its surface.
title: Black altar table
